wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Rendall (11 June 1964 – c. 23 January 2013) was a Somerset Maugham Award-winning British writer.

response: * Jonathan Rendall for This Bloody Mary Is the Last Thing I Own

link_mentions.page: This Champagne Mojito Is the Last Thing I Own
response: The title is a reference to Jonathan Rendall's novel This Bloody Mary (Is the Last Thing I Own). A champagne Mojito is a cocktail made with spearmint, rum, sugar, lime and champagne, which Ross purchases with his last €20.

response: **Jonathan Rendall, English author (born 1964)Jonathan Rendall dies, The Times, 7 February 2013.
**Jonathan Rendall, 48, author (death announced on this date)
*Jonathan Rendall, 48, English author.Jonathan Rendall dies, The Times, 7 February 2013

He went on to make feature documentaries collaborating with novelist Luke Rhinehart and comedian Frank Skinner, before directing two separate year-long, three-part series for Channel 4: White Tribe (with Darcus Howe) and The Gambler (with Jonathan Rendall).
